legacy.full_text: How would #Huawei's new MATE 60 pro impact Apple's position in the market? Watch the video to find out more. https://t.co/zSpQwzZbKG

📱Interviewed Dan Hutcheson, Vice Chair of @techinsightsinc, for a comparison between the latest #Huawei phones and the #Iphone15 series.

Also asked if Huawei's new phones signal a workaround of US sanctions.

Check out his insights! #MediaUnlocked

legacy.full_text:
❓Will ChiNa inVAde TaIwAn❓🧵

On Tuesday, China unveiled a plan to boost development on both sides of the TaiwanStrait. A demonstration zone is set in Fujian, a province situated on mainland’s southeast coast which is both physically and culturally close to #Taiwan. https://t.co/nf9MuWZsXx

legacy.description:
China-based Journalists | Covering China & Global Issues 

We have been known for our reports on Xinjiang. #MediaUnlocked #China
legacy.name: MediaUnlocked

legacy.full_text: Fujian and Taiwan have deep historical and cultural ties. People in two places have the same folk belief, for example the Chinese sea goddess #Mazu. The new plan of demonstration zone stressed the cultural exchanges and cooperation between Fujian and Taiwan. https://t.co/hJhIGdqqPD

legacy.description:
China-based Journalists | Covering China & Global Issues 

We have been known for our reports on Xinjiang. #MediaUnlocked #China

legacy.full_text: The new plan of Fujian demonstration zone is a warm welcome to Taiwan residents and enterprises, showcasing China’s willingness of deepening ties across the Taiwan Strait. Unity and peace is always the optimal choice.
